metadata.note: Minimal version for GitHub. Expands on deployment.

knowledge_base.title: Section 302 IPC - Murder
knowledge_base.content: Section 302 IPC: Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death, or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine. Murder requires intention to cause death.

knowledge_base.title: Section 154 CrPC - FIR Registration
knowledge_base.content: Section 154 CrPC: Information about cognizable offense must be registered as FIR. Police cannot refuse to register FIR.

knowledge_base.title: Article 21 - Right to Life
knowledge_base.content: Article 21: No person shall be deprived of life or personal liberty except according to procedure established by law.

knowledge_base.title: Section 498A IPC - Dowry Harassment
knowledge_base.content: Section 498A IPC: Husband or relatives subjecting woman to cruelty. Non-bailable offense with imprisonment up to 3 years.

knowledge_base.title: Section 138 NI Act - Cheque Bounce
knowledge_base.content: Section 138: Dishonor of cheque for insufficient funds is punishable with fine up to twice the cheque amount.
